query.query: {"measures":[["sum","amount"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\";a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}};a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}};  b = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\" || 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate \"Forecast\" as 'Group', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'sum_amount'; c = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate \"Won\" as 'Group', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'sum_amount'; d = group a by all; d = foreach d generate coalesce({{cell(kpi_quota_forecast_hidden.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\").asString()}},0) as 'sum_amount', \"Quota\" as 'Group'; e = union c,b,d;","groups":["Group"]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"team_opptys = load \"<opportunity>\"; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_parent_id_hidden.result, [\"Role.DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.DeveloperName\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; team_opptys = group team_opptys by 'OwnerId'; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate 'OwnerId' as 'OwnerId', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'owner_amount'; team_opptys = group team_opptys by all; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate coalesce(coalesce(sum('owner_amount'),0) / unique('OwnerId'),0) as 'team_avg'; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate coalesce(({{coalesce(cell(kpi_open_pipe.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} - coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0)) / coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0),0) as 'sum_percent' ;"}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"opp = load \"<opportunity>\"; opp = filter opp by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; opp = filter opp by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; today = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [..\"current day\"]; last_week = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [..\"7 days ago\"]; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']),0) == 0 && coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) > 0 then 1.0 else coalesce((coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) - coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']),0))/coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']),0),0) end) as 'sum_percent' ;"}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(kpi_activities_completed_comparision.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"),0).asObject()}}  as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#0BA976\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#C03757\" else \"#44517D\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"team_opptys = load \"<opportunity>\"; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by {{column(dropdown_parent_id_hidden.result, [\"Role.DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.DeveloperName\")}}; team_opptys = filter team_opptys by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; team_opptys = group team_opptys by 'OwnerId'; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate 'OwnerId' as 'OwnerId', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'owner_amount'; team_opptys = group team_opptys by all; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate coalesce(coalesce(sum('owner_amount'),0) / unique('OwnerId'),0) as 'team_avg'; team_opptys = foreach team_opptys generate coalesce(({{coalesce(cell(kpi_closed_won.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} - coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0)) / coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0),0) as 'sum_percent' ;"}

{"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_forecast_category.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}} || 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = group a by all; b = foreach a generate  (case when {{coalesce(cell(kpi_quota_forecast_hidden.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"),0).asObject()}} - sum('Amount') > 0 then {{coalesce(cell(kpi_quota_forecast_hidden.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"),0).asObject()}} - sum('Amount') else 0 end) as 'sum_QuotaAmount';","measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]]}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Role.DeveloperName"],"filters":[["Name","{{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asObject()}}"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"opp_history = load \"<pipeline_trending>\"; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Type\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by 'Stage.IsClosed' == \"false\"; today = filter opp_history by date('ValidFromDate_Year', 'ValidFromDate_Month', 'ValidFromDate_Day') in [..\"current day\"]; today = filter today by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in [\"1 day ahead\"..]; today = foreach today generate coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'Amount'; last_week = filter opp_history by date('ValidFromDate_Year', 'ValidFromDate_Month', 'ValidFromDate_Day') in [..\"8 day ago\"]; last_week = filter last_week by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in [\"7 days ago\"..]; last_week = foreach last_week generate coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'AmountP'; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when coalesce(sum(last_week['AmountP']),0) == 0 && coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) > 0 then 1.0 else coalesce((coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) - coalesce(sum(last_week['AmountP']),0))/ coalesce(sum(last_week['AmountP']),0),0) end) as 'sum_percent' ;"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"filters":[["IsClosed",["false"],"in"],["CloseDate","{{column(dropdown_close_date.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Name","{{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Type"]}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["StageName"],"filters":[["StageName",["Closed Lost","Closed Won"],"not in"]]}
{"measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]],"filters":[["StartDate","{{column(dropdown_close_date.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(kpi_open_pipe_comparision.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"),0).asObject()}}  as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#0BA976\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#C03757\" else \"#44517D\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"filters":[["IsWon",["true"],"in"],["CloseDate","{{column(dropdown_close_date.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Name","{{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<activity>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Type\")}}; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; today = filter a by date('<activity>Date_Year','<activity>Date_Month', '<activity>Date_Day') in [\"7 days ago\"..\"current day\"]; last_week = filter a by date('<activity>Date_Year','<activity>Date_Month', '<activity>Date_Day') in [\"15 days ago\"..\"8 days ago\"]; q = group today by all full, last_week by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(count('today'),0) as 'today', coalesce(count('last_week'),0) as 'last_week'; q = foreach q generate (case when coalesce(sum('last_week'),0) == 0 && coalesce(sum('today'),0) > 0 then 1.0 else coalesce((coalesce(sum('today'),0) - coalesce(sum('last_week'),0))/coalesce(sum('last_week'),0),0) end) as 'sum_percent';"}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["RecordType.Name"]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = group a by 'ForecastCategoryName'; a = foreach a generate 'ForecastCategoryName' as 'ForecastCategoryName', (case when 'ForecastCategoryName' == \"Closed\" then -1 else avg('Stage.SortOrder')end) as 'SortOrder'; a = order a by 'SortOrder' asc;","measures":[],"groups":["ForecastCategoryName"]}

{"measures":[["count","*"]],"filters":[["IsClosed",["true"],"in"],["<activity>Date","{{column(dropdown_close_date.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Name","{{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Opportunity.RecordType.Name","{{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Opportunity.Type","{{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = filter q by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' ==\"false\"; q = filter q by {{column(dropdown_stage_list.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"StageName\")}}; q = group q by ('Id','Name'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id','Name' as 'Name', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', sum('DaysSinceLast<activity>') as 'DaysBetween'; q = filter q by 'DaysBetween' > 60; q = order q by 'sum_Amount' desc; q = limit q 10;","groups":["Name"],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"measures":[["sum","amount"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\";a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}};a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}};  b = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\" || 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate \"Forecast\" as 'Group', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'sum_amount'; c = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate \"Won\" as 'Group', coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'sum_amount';  e = union c,b;","groups":["Group"]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(kpi_closed_won_comparision.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"),0).asObject()}}  as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#0BA976\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#C03757\" else \"#44517D\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Owner.Name"],"filters":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_forecast_category.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Week'); a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CloseDate_Week' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Week', sum(sum('Amount')) over([.. 0] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Week')) as 'sum_Amount';","groups":[["CloseDate_Year","CloseDate_Week"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]],"pigql":"b = load \"<quota>\"; b = filter b by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"User.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate coalesce(sum('QuotaAmount'),0) as 'sum_QuotaAmount';"}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<activity>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_parent_id_hidden.result, [\"Role.DeveloperName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.DeveloperName\"); a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('<activity>Date_Year', '<activity>Date_Month', '<activity>Date_Day')\")}}; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; a = group a by 'OwnerId'; a = foreach a generate count() as 'owner_count', 'OwnerId' as 'OwnerId'; a = group a by all; a = foreach a generate coalesce(coalesce(sum('owner_count'),0) / unique('OwnerId'),0) as 'team_avg'; a = foreach a generate coalesce(({{coalesce(cell(kpi_activities_completed.result, 0, \"count\"), 0).asObject()}} - coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0)) / coalesce(sum('team_avg'),0),0) as 'sum_percent';"}

{"pigql":"won = load \"<opportunity>\"; won = filter won by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; won = filter won by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won = foreach won generate coalesce(sum('Amount'),0) as 'sum_Amount'; quota = load \"<quota>\"; quota = filter quota by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"User.Name\")}}; quota = group quota by all; quota = foreach quota generate coalesce(sum('QuotaAmount'),0) as 'sum_quota'; remain = group won by all full, quota by all; remain = foreach remain generate coalesce(sum(quota['sum_quota']),0) - coalesce(sum(won['sum_Amount']),0) as 'sum_remaining_quota'; remain = foreach remain generate  (case when sum('sum_remaining_quota')  > 0 then  sum('sum_remaining_quota')  else 0 end) as 'sum_remaining_quota';","measures":[["sum","remaining_quota"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","AnnualRevenue"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<account>\"; a = filter a by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; b = load \"<opportunity>\"; c = group a by 'Name' left, b by 'Account.Name'; c = foreach c generate a['Name'] as 'Name', b['Account.Name'] as 'Account.Name', coalesce(sum(a['AnnualRevenue']),0) as 'sum_AnnualRevenue'; c = filter c by 'Account.Name' is null; c = order c by 'sum_AnnualRevenue' desc; c = limit c 10;","groups":["Name"],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"won = load \"<opportunity>\"; won = filter won by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; won = filter won by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; q = load \"<quota>\"; q = filter q by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"User.Name\")}}; attainment = group won by all full, q by all; attainment = foreach attainment generate (case when sum(won['Amount']) / sum(q['QuotaAmount']) > 0 then sum(won['Amount']) / sum(q['QuotaAmount']) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_attainment';","measures":[["sum","quota_attainment"]]}

{"pigql":"won = load \"<opportunity>\"; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; won = filter won by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won = filter won by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; quota = load \"<quota>\"; quota = filter quota by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"User.Name\")}}; remaining_quota = group won by all full, quota by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate sum(quota['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(won['Amount']),0) as 'amount'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'remaining_quota'; open = load \"<opportunity>\"; open = filter open by {{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(dropdown_forecast_category.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; open = filter open by {{cell(dropdown_close_date.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; open = filter open by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; coverage = group remaining_quota by all full, open by all; coverage = foreach coverage generate coalesce(sum(open['Amount']),0) as 'amount', sum(remaining_quota['remaining_quota']) as 'remaining_quota'; coverage = foreach coverage generate round(coalesce(sum('amount') / sum('remaining_quota'),0),1) as 'sum_pipe_coverage'; f = filter coverage by 'sum_pipe_coverage' > 0;","measures":[["sum","pipe_coverage"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"limit":10,"groups":["Name"],"filters":[["IsClosed",["false"],"in"],["CloseDate","{{column(dropdown_close_date.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Name","{{column(dropdown_id_hidden.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["CreatedDate","{{column(dropdown_created_date.selection, [\"compact\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(dropdown_record_type.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(dropdown_opportunity_type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["StageName","{{column(dropdown_stage_list.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asObject()}}","in"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

parameters.text: Area to Focus on to Close More Deals
* Opportunities with no <activity> in the past 60 days.
Areas to Focus on to Close More Deals
Metrics are compared to last year
